channel.title: 2FA to Tray
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Added support for app autoupdate.
  • Dropdown to the status menu by force-clicking on status icon (Handful when you already clicked the icon but realized that you have the wrong account selected, so you put a bit more force and select the right one)
  • Open the status menu with OPTION (‚å•) + Click on status icon
  • Hold Shift while reopening the app (Spotlight action) to open the status menu
